name: DodgeSquare (HAPPYgmSan)
description:
So basically, you know that game called dodge ball, so yeah thats that except it is 2d and its all just squares... Yeah... Just some bad game I know, but still it is my first java project,  so it is what it is. 

                                                                Anyways how to play:                                                                       You need to try to dodge the squares basically (as you could have gueesd). To win (for now) you have to try to survive for 20 levels (they are not that long) but it is very hard, some may say it is impossible).

    This game is a work in progress it is just a rough sketch of what could become something bigger. In future updates I'm planning on adding some power ups (if you have any suggestions please leave a comment). Also I am going to add an option to choose difficulties (what I have now is probably going to be a normal difficulty).
